Package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.client

Interface CachingConfiguration

  • @ConsumerType
public interface CachingConfiguration
    A configuration instance for the caching HalResourceLoader implementations created with HalResourceLoaderBuilder. It needs to be passed to HalResourceLoaderBuilder.withCachingConfiguration(CachingConfiguration) to become effective.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getDefaultMaxAge​(Optional<Integer> statusCode)
      Determines for how long a cached response that doesn't have a "cache-control: max-age" directive will be used (before it is considered stale and retrieved again)
      boolean isCachingOfHalApiClientExceptionsEnabled()
      Determines whether the cache should also cover non-successful responses, where a HalApiClientException was caught.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultMaxAge

        int getDefaultMaxAge​(Optional<Integer> statusCode)
        Determines for how long a cached response that doesn't have a "cache-control: max-age" directive will be used (before it is considered stale and retrieved again)
        Parameters:
        statusCode - of the HTTP response (can be empty if the request failed without a status code)
        Returns:
        the number of seconds the response should be served from cache, or 0 if it shouldn't be cached at all

      • isCachingOfHalApiClientExceptionsEnabled

        boolean isCachingOfHalApiClientExceptionsEnabled()
        Determines whether the cache should also cover non-successful responses, where a HalApiClientException was caught. Follow-up requests for the same URL will then immediately throw a HalApiClientException with the cached status code and body (unless the cached response is already stale according to the response's or default max-age value).
        Returns:
        true if error responses should be cached as well
